data.text: Asi vavengi vako vazhinji vachava seguruva rakatsetseka,
Ipapo mhomho dzendudzi dzose dzakawanda dzinorwa neArieri,
sezvinoitwa nomunhu ane nzara anorota achidya,
Jehovha akauyisa pamusoro penyu hope huru;

Nokuti kwamuri, chiratidzo ichi hachizi chinhu asi mashoko akanamirwa murugwaro. Uye kana mukapa rugwaro kuno mumwe munhu anogona kuverenga, mukati kwaari, “Ndapota, verenga izvi,” achapindura achiti, “Handikwanisi, nokuti rwakanamirwa.”
Kana kuti mukapa rugwaro kuno mumwe asingagoni kuverenga, mukati kwaari, “Ndapota, verenga izvi,” achapindura achiti, “Handigoni kuverenga.”
Vane nhamo avo vanosvika kwakadzika dzika
Ko, Rebhanoni haingashandurwi ikava munda wakaorera muchinguva chidiki,
Pazuva iro vanamati vachanzwa shoko rorugwaro,
avo vanopomera munhu mhosva neshoko chete,
Naizvozvo izvi ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha, akadzikinura Abhurahama, achiti kuimba yaJakobho:
